attributes.action: Award Gurkha Tul Bahadur Pun VC, British citizenship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gurkha Tul Bahadur Pun, awarded the Victoria Cross in 1944 for his bravery fighting the Japanese in Burma, is now aged 84 and suffering a variety of conditions which require daily medication - not always available in Nepal - has applied to come and live in Britain. His application has been rejected because of 'failure to demonstrate strong ties with the UK' The Home Office attitude to this man is attrocious, and should be rescinded immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
